venue.address_1: UMass-JFK T Stop/Moakley Columbus Park, Intersection of Columbia Rd., Morrissey Blvd. and Day Blvd.
venue.name: Moakley Columbus Park

item.description: On August 24 from 7-9 AM at the Columbus Moakley Park rotary, near the JFK/UMass redline MBTA station, we will again standout and sign wave on this very busy morning commuter route. This will be our fifth standout at this location. We had a great success showing our Ron Paul signs and banner to thousands of commuters the first, second (even in the rain!), third and fourth time around. An added bonus for this standout-signwave location is the opportunity to demonstrate public support for Ron Paul to the Boston Globe newspaper located right down the street on Morrissey Blvd. Plenty of signs available for everyone! Let's make this very high traffic location a great success and a larger turnout! At the UMass MBTA stop exit at the upper level on Columbia Road. Map of location (Columbus-Moakley Park at intersection of Columbia, Morrissey Blvd and Day Blvd.) Note: Rotary is just to the south of red star on map. For more info: Joe at 617 436-0320
item.name: Dorchester-South Boston Morning Standout/Sign Wave
